item.title: Comparison of Large Language Models for Deployment Requirements

item.title: Model Misalignment and Language Change: Traces of AI-Associated Language in Unscripted Spoken English
item.description: arXiv:2508.00238v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In recent years, written language, particularly in science and education, has undergone remarkable shifts in word usage.
